hide-for-all-players.name: Hide For All Players
hide-for-all-players.hint: Applies the hidden UI configuration to all players (Not GM).

hide-for-assisstant-gm.name: Hide For Assistant GM
hide-for-assisstant-gm.hint: Applies the hidden UI configuration to assistant GM (Not GM).

hidden-players.name: Player Names With Hidden UI
hidden-players.hint: Hides the UI for players with these names (Comma seperated list). Overridden by Hide For All Players setting.

hide-personal-ui.title: Personal UI Configuration
hide-personal-ui.hint: Configuration menu for which elements to show / hide on this screen.

hide-connecting-players-ui.title: Connecting Player's UI Configuration
hide-connecting-players-ui.hint: Configuration menu for which elements to show / hide for connecting players.

settings-form.refresh-player-sessions: Player sessions will have to be refreshed for these changes to take effect.

hide-logo.label: Hide Foundry logo
hide-logo.notes: Hides Foundry logo in upper left corner of the screen

hide-navigation.sub-options-label: Or hide specific parts of the navigation section - Overridden by Hide Navigation Section setting

complete.label: Hide Navigation Section
complete.notes: Hides navigation section across top of screen

hide-controls.label: Hide Controls
hide-controls.notes: Hides player controls across left of screen

hide-sidebar.sub-options-label: Or hide specific tabs of the sidebar - Overridden by Hide Sidebar setting

complete.label: Hide Sidebar
complete.notes: Hides the whole sidebar across right of screen

hide-players.label: Hide Active Players
hide-players.notes: Hides active players display in bottom left of screen

hide-hotbar.label: Hide Hotbar
hide-hotbar.notes: Hides hotbar across bottom of screen

hide-token-hud.label: Hide Token HUD
hide-token-hud.notes: Hides the token HUD quick actions that appear around a token on the canvas

hide-token-action-hud.label: Hide Token Action HUD
hide-token-action-hud.notes: Hides the token action HUD popup from the Token Action HUD module

hide-custom-hotbar.label: Hide Custom Hotbar
hide-custom-hotbar.notes: Hides custom hotbar across bottom of screen from the Custom Hotbar module

hide-css-by-css-selector.label: Hide By CSS Selectors
hide-css-by-css-selector.notes: Hides elements specified by CSS selectors. Multiple selectors should be delimited by a semi-colon (;)
